quote: Amateurs hack systems, professionals hack people.
author: Bruce Schneier

quote: If you spend more on coffee than on IT security, you will be hacked. What’s more, you deserve to be hacked.
author: Richard Clarke

quote: Data is the pollution problem of the information age, and protecting privacy is the environmental challenge.
author: Bruce Schneier

quote: Time is what determines security. With enough time nothing is unhackable.
author: Aniekee Tochukwu Ezekiel

quote: Passwords are like underwear. Don’t let people see it, change it very often, and you shouldn’t share it with strangers.
author: Chris Pirillo

quote: No technology that’s connected to the Internet is unhackable.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Social engineering bypasses all technologies, including firewalls.
author: Kevin Mitnick

quote: Phishing is a major problem because there really is no patch for human stupidity.
author: Mike Danseglio

quote: If you think you know-it-all about cybersecurity, this discipline was probably ill-explained to you.
author: Stephane Nappo

quote: My message to companies that think they haven’t been attacked is: ‘You’re not looking hard enough.’
author: James Snook

quote: Never underestimate the determination of a kid who is time-rich and cash-poor.
author: Cory Doctorow
